ticket.title: RFC-0032 Phase 5: merge completion alignment (fix merge_executor `gate_receipt_id` misuse; emit merge receipt + work.completed coherently)

in_scope: Fix `crates/apm2-daemon/src/gate/merge_executor.rs` so merge receipt id is not stored in `gate_receipt_id` field
Introduce an explicit `merge_receipt_id` field (proto change) or carry merge receipt hash in an evidence bundle referenced by work.completed
Ensure merge executor emits a dedicated merge receipt event (`merge.receipt_recorded` or equivalent) and then emits `work.completed` with evidence references
Add regression test that asserts the field semantics (no more misnamed gate_receipt_id)

steps: Identify current WorkCompleted emission in merge executor and its proto payload fields
Update proto/kernel_events.proto and corresponding reducers/projections as needed (add merge_receipt_id or evidence bundle fields)
Update merge executor implementation to emit merge receipt + work.completed in a consistent order and with correct identifiers
Add unit/integration test covering a simulated merge completion and verifying recorded ids

criteria: merge_executor no longer overloads gate_receipt_id with merge receipt values.
Work completion events carry sufficient evidence references to replay merge admission decisions.

notes.verification: Add an assertion in merge executor path that rejects a merge_receipt_id string that matches the old `merge-receipt-<sha>` pattern being placed in gate_receipt_id.
